name: @cstrlcs/sprout
description: Simple seeded fake data generator for TypeScript

scripts.build:js: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --external typescript --minify
scripts.build:dts: tsc --noEmit false --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir dist && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist
scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:dts
